resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a ticket

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a ticket

options.name: Get
options.description: Retrieve a ticket

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve many tickets

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a ticket

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

email.name: email
email.description: Email address of the ticket author
email.ai_hint: Email address of the ticket author

roles.name: roles
roles.description: Role to assign to the agent

values.name: role
values.description: Name of the role to assign to the agent. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: assignment_scope
values.description: Scope in which the agent may use the permissions granted by the role

values.name: groups
values.description: Groups in which the permissions granted by the role apply. Required only when Scope is Specified Groups - ignored otherwise. Choose from the list or specify an ID using an expression. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

roles.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: cc_emails
options.description: Comma-separated email addresses to add in the CC field of the ticket email

options.name: department_id
options.description: ID of the department to which this ticket belongs. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: group_id
options.description: ID of the group to which the ticket has been assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: name
options.description: Name of the ticket author

options.name: requester_id
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

agentId.name: agentId
agentId.description: ID of the agent to update
agentId.ai_hint: ID of the agent to update

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: agent_id
options.description: ID of the agent to whom the tickets have been assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: group_id
options.description: ID of the group to which the tickets have been assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: created_at
options.description: Date when the ticket was created

options.name: due_by
options.description: Date when the ticket is due to be resolved

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'agent' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'agent' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'agent' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'firstName'
IF resource == 'agent' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'roles'

IF resource == 'agent' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'agent' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
